name: Stoney's Adventure: The 8 Bonus Rounds (Demo)
description:
Stoney's Adventure: The 8 Bonus Rounds is a platformer made in RPG Maker VX Ace, in this demo you jump, fly and drive through 8 challenge levels.

NOTE: This demo focuses on optional content found in the final game, so this does not entirely represent the final product.

CONTROLS:
Arrow Keys - Move in 8 directions
A - Jump
Shift - Sprint
Q - Equip Go Kart
W - Equip Super Shoes
ESC - Pause Menu/Inventory

FEATURES:
-3 Playable Characters with unique attributes and abilities.
-8 Entirely unique levels that can be replayed.
-Unlockable power ups, items & costumes.
-2 different versions of the soundtrack.

Credits:
stoney0503 - everything
Markyevansy - additional sound design

Script Credits:
Galv
JV Master

Gamejolt Page: https://gamejolt.com/games/stoneysadventure/409951
